---
title: "shared.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines a TypeScript type, `DefaultPayload`, which represents the common structure of outbound responses for the Carequality integration. It includes fields for identifying the response, the original request, and the patient.

## Symbols

### `DefaultPayload`
#### Description
This type defines the common structure for outbound response payloads in the Carequality integration. It ensures consistent formatting for responses related to Carequality requests.

#### Inputs
N/A - This is a type definition, not a function.

#### Outputs
N/A - This is a type definition, not a function.

#### Internal Logic
The type defines three properties:
- `id`: A unique identifier for the response itself.
- `requestId`: The ID of the original request that this response corresponds to.
- `patientId`: The ID of the patient associated with the request and response.
